Uses of Interface
senselogic.sitevision.api.render.ImageScaler

  • Packages that use ImageScaler 
    Package Description
    senselogic.sitevision.api
    Contains the Utils interface - the main entry point to get instances of classes in the Sitevision Utility API.
    senselogic.sitevision.api.render
    Rendering utility interfaces that might be needed when rendering

    • Uses of ImageScaler in senselogic.sitevision.api

      Methods in senselogic.sitevision.api that return ImageScaler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ImageScaler Utils.getImageScaler(int aMaxWidth, int aMaxHeight)
      Gets an instance of an immutable image scaler that enables scaling of images to a certain size.

    • Uses of ImageScaler in senselogic.sitevision.api.render

      Methods in senselogic.sitevision.api.render with parameters of type ImageScaler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ImageRenderer.setImageScaler(ImageScaler anImageScaler)
      Sets the image scaler that should be used by the renderer if useImageScaler is true.

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
